Texts.Eng:
During the Harrowing, the Aegi remember the dead and celebrate the living. It's a time for candy, costumes and tricks! This event features:

- A new event-themed ^cyan;vendor ^reset;who sells a variety of event items. You can find Ayala, the Harrowing event vendor, in the Creon Embassy

- ^cyan;Collectible masks ^reset;and ^cyan;costumes ^reset;for all races

- ^cyan;Sweet candy ^reset;that offers a variety of useful and fun status effects

- New quests for obtaining event-themed ^orange;Unique-quality items^reset;

- Event-themed ^cyan;decorative objects ^reset;to bring the Harrowing to your own home
